overview: Straight pal Casey Moore reacts badly when Brenner Bolton makes a pass, but then quickly changes the tune on his skin flute. When delivery boy Mitch Hanson runs into his former flame Brendan Phillips, they hook up for old time's sake. Burglar Lance Taylor cops a deal with shady lawyer Blake Barnes, promising sex in exchange for legal representation. Step-dad Dean Phoenix enjoys family bonding time with step-son Johnny Riley, while the missus goes shopping.
title: Bareback Intrusion
